task.title: Duplicate Record
task.shortdesc: Duplicate a record in an existing session.

step.cmd: Display the record which you would like to duplicate and click the Duplicate record button in the top left corner of the Session Editor or choose the Session Duplicate record (CMD/CTRL+D) menu item.
step.stepresult: This will create a duplicate record immediately following the original. The duplicate record will be visible from the Record Data view.
